snippet.title: Elixir Emporium devlog #1 - An infinite crafting RPG
snippet.description:
We've been working pretty darn hard on Elixir Emporium for a while now, and I'm excited to finally start showing off what we have so far.

Wishlist Elixir Emporium on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3039840/Elixir_Emporium/

Join our Discord server to follow along and get involved: https://discord.gg/ExaBNvACay

If you have any feedback or ideas for the game, we'd also love to hear them in the comments. We're still VERY early in this game and very much in the stage of prototyping things to figure out what's fun and what's not, so any early thoughts are very appreciated!
